bibl.title: P.Iand.Inv. 398: a fragmentary Ptolemaic prosangelma
bibl.note: Purchased by Carl Schmidt (Berlin) in 1927 somewhere in Egypt (probably in the Fayum), subsequently acquired by Karl Kalbfleisch for his private collection. Philadelpheia?, 2nd half of the 2nd cent. BC?
bibl.seg: Constantinos Balamoshev, P. Iand. inv. 398: A fragmentary Ptolemaic prosangelma.

Purchased by Carl Schmidt (Berlin) in 1927 somewhere in Egypt (probably in the Fayum), subsequently acquired by Karl Kalbfleisch for his private collection. Philadelpheia?, 2nd half of the 2nd cent. BC?
